measured_by: Three Domain Disgust Scale (pathogen disgust subscale)
justification: The paper specifies that disgust sensitivity was measured using the pathogen disgust subscale of the Three Domain Disgust Scale in Sample 1, indicating its use to assess the topic of disgust sensitivity.

In Sample 2 and Study 2, disgust sensitivity was measured using the 27-item Disgust Sensitivity Scale-Revised. This scale is indicated as the instrument for capturing individual differences in disgust sensitivity.
